pullrequest.title: Model editor Part 1 - part and joint creation

content.raw:
I got a segfault after creating a model with two cylinders + one revolute joint, and then, click "save". This is the gzclient backtrace:


```
#!c++

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff6aa9b54 in gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::GenerateSDF (this=0x1135990)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/ModelCreator.cc:774
774	}
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff6aa9b54 in gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::GenerateSDF (
    this=0x1135990)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/ModelCreator.cc:774
#1  0x00007ffff6ab65e7 in gazebo::gui::ModelEditorPalette::OnDone (this=
    0x11b1f10)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/ModelEditorPalette.cc:439
#2  0x00007ffff54c9281 in QMetaObject::activate(QObject*, QMetaObject const*, int, void**) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#3  0x00007ffff6067c72 in QAbstractButton::clicked(bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#4  0x00007ffff5da5a4e in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#5  0x00007ffff5da6d8b in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#6  0x00007ffff5da6ffc in QAbstractButton::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#7  0x00007ffff5a28144 in QWidget::event(QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#8  0x00007ffff59d7894 in QApplicationPrivate::notify_helper(QObject*, QEvent*)
    () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#9  0x00007ffff59dd0bf in QApplication::notify(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#10 0x00007ffff54b4e9c in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal(QObject*, QEvent*)
    () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
---Type <return> to continue, or q <return> to quit---
#11 0x00007ffff59d8862 in QApplicationPrivate::sendMouseEvent(QWidget*, QMouseEvent*, QWidget*, QWidget*, QWidget**, QPointer<QWidget>&, bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#12 0x00007ffff5a57bf5 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#13 0x00007ffff5a56bae in QApplication::x11ProcessEvent(_XEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#14 0x00007ffff5a800d2 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#15 0x00007ffff0eaed53 in g_main_context_dispatch ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#16 0x00007ffff0eaf0a0 in ?? () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#17 0x00007ffff0eaf164 in g_main_context_iteration ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#18 0x00007ffff54e43bf in QEventDispatcherGlib::processEvents(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#19 0x00007ffff5a7fd5e in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#20 0x00007ffff54b3c82 in QEventLoop::processEvents(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#21 0x00007ffff54b3ed7 in QEventLoop::exec(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#22 0x00007ffff54b8f67 in QCoreApplication::exec() ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#23 0x00000000004b5cbc in gazebo::gui::run (_argc=1, _argv=0x7fffffffcbb8)
    at /home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc:203
---Type <return> to continue, or q <return> to quit---
```
